title: John Coltrane - Settin' The Pace 1958 / 2008
description:
John Coltrane

Settin' The Pace


Recorded in 1958, released in 1961

RVG 2008



CD / 320Kbps



Tracklist:

1. I See Your Face Before Me 	 
2. If There Is Someone Lovelier Than You 	 
3. Little Melonae 	 
4. Rise 'N' Shine 	
5. By The Numbers *



Recorded in Hackensack, NJ on March 26, 1958



Personnel:

John Coltrane, tenor saxophone
Red Garland,  piano
Paul Chambers,  bass
Art Taylor, drums



"Settin' The Pace" provides more than worthwhile material from a period of John Coltrane's career when the astonishing burst of creativity that would stay with him to the end was just on the point of realisation.

The rhythm section here has appeared with on several Prestige releases as the Red Garland Trio. Both Garland and Chambers have played with Coltrane in the Miles Davis Quintet, and Art Taylor did some work with Davis as well.  

This is Coltrane in a relaxed bop mode, making some swinging, relaxed jazz. Anyone who likes the mainstream jazz of the '50s, or Miles' music of that time, or Coltrane fans who want to hear their idol in an easygoing context, should pick this up. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a great one.

For this RVG edition, a fifth track, "By The Numbers", a blues based jam is also included.


 
Straight, no chaser.
:)
